languages.text: "О чем ты, мон-кай? Ты так же далек{mf||а} от понимания моей души, как свет охладевших звезд далек от ваших жалких миров. Ты радостно впускаешь в себя то зло, что погубило мой народ еще на заре времен. Понимание? Нет. Ты вызываешь во мне лишь жалость".

"What are you talking about, mon-keigh? You are as far from understanding my soul as the light of the faded cold stars is far from your wretched worlds. You are enthusiastically opening yourself to the evil that destroyed my people at the dawn of time. Understanding? No. All I have for you is pity."
languages.original_text: "О чем ты, мон-кай? Ты так же далек{mf||а} от понимания моей души, как свет охладевших звезд далек от ваших жалких миров. Ты радостно впускаешь в себя то зло, что погубило мой народ еще на заре времен. Понимание? Нет. Ты вызываешь во мне лишь жалость".

traits.locale_text: "What are you talking about, mon-keigh? You are as far from understanding my soul as the light of faded cold stars is far from your sorry worlds. You are enthusiastically opening up to the evil that destroyed my people at the dawn of time. Understanding? No. All I have for you is pity."

You are enthusiastically opening yourself to the evil that destroyed my people at the dawn of time. Understanding? No. All I have for you is pity."

"What are you talking about, mon-keigh? You are as far from understanding my soul as the light of the faded cold stars is far from your wretched worlds. You are enthusiastically opening yourself to the evil that destroyed my people at the dawn of time. Understanding? No. All I have for you is pity."

languages.text: “你在胡说什么呢，猴子？你离理解我的灵魂还很遥远，正如褪色的寒星之光离你那些悲惨的世界还很遥远一样。那些邪恶早在时间刚刚诞生的时候，就毁灭了我的族群，而你却打算向邪恶敞开大门。理解？不，我对你只有怜悯。”
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, mon-keigh? You are as far from understanding my soul as the light of the faded cold stars is far from your wretched worlds. You are enthusiastically opening yourself to the evil that destroyed my people at the dawn of time. Understanding? No. All I have for you is pity."

traits.locale_text: “你在胡说什么呢，猴子？你离理解我的灵魂还很遥远，正如褪色的寒星之光离你那些悲惨的世界还很遥远一样。你愿意向邪恶敞开大门，而那些邪恶早在时间刚刚诞生的时候，就毁灭了我的族群？理解？不，我对你只有怜悯。”

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイ、お前は一体何の話をしているんだ？私の意図を全く理解していない。まるで、光の消えた冷たい星が、お前の醜い世界から離れているかのようだ。私の仲間をあっという間に殺したあの悪魔に、お前はこうも簡単に心を開いている。お前に理解？するわけがない。お前には、同情しかしていないよ」
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, mon-keigh? You are as far from understanding my soul as the light of the faded cold stars is far from your wretched worlds. You are enthusiastically opening yourself to the evil that destroyed my people at the dawn of time. Understanding? No. All I have for you is pity."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイ、お前は一体何の話をしているんだ？私の意図を全く理解していない。まるで、光の消えた冷たい星が、世界から離れているかのようだ。私の仲間をあっという間に殺したあの悪魔に、お前はこうも簡単に心を開いている。お前に理解？するわけがない。お前には、同情しかしていないよ」

languages.text: «¿De qué hablas, mon-keigh? Estás tan lejos de comprender mi alma como lo está la luz de las estrellas de tus despreciables mundos. Te abres con entusiasmo al mal que destruyó a mi pueblo en los albores de los tiempos. ¿Entendimiento? No. Solo me das lástima».
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, mon-keigh? You are as far from understanding my soul as the light of the faded cold stars is far from your wretched worlds. You are enthusiastically opening yourself to the evil that destroyed my people at the dawn of time. Understanding? No. All I have for you is pity."

traits.locale_text: «¿De qué hablas, mon-keigh? Estás tan lejos de comprender mi alma como lo está la luz de las estrellas de tus lamentables mundos. Te abres con entusiasmo al mal que destruyó a mi pueblo en los albores de los tiempos. ¿Entendimiento? No. Solo me das lástima».

languages.text: "Was redet Ihr da, Chem-Pan-Sey? Ihr seid so weit davon entfernt, meine Seele zu verstehen, wie das Licht verblasster, kalter Sterne von Euren erbärmlichen Welten entfernt ist. Ihr öffnet Euch voller Begeisterung für das Böse, das bei Anbeginn der Zeiten mein Volk zerstört hat. Verständnis? Nein. Ich empfinde für Euch nur Mitleid."
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, mon-keigh? You are as far from understanding my soul as the light of the faded cold stars is far from your wretched worlds. You are enthusiastically opening yourself to the evil that destroyed my people at the dawn of time. Understanding? No. All I have for you is pity."

traits.locale_text: "Was redet Ihr da, Chem-Pan-Sey? Ihr seid so weit davon entfernt, meine Seele zu verstehen, wie das Licht verblasster, kalter Sterne von Euren erbärmlichen Welten entfernt ist. Ihr öffnet Euch voller Begeisterung für das Böse, das bei Anbeginn der Zeiten mein Volk zerstört hat. Verständnis? Nein. Ich empfinde für Euch nur Mitleid."

languages.text: « De quoi parlez-vous, mon-keigh ? Vous êtes aussi près de comprendre mon âme que vos pitoyables mondes de recevoir la lumière d'étoiles éteintes. Vous accueillez à bras ouverts le mal qui a détruit mon peuple à l'aube des temps. Nous comprendre ? Non. Tout ce que je ressens pour vous, c'est de la pitié. »
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, mon-keigh? You are as far from understanding my soul as the light of the faded cold stars is far from your wretched worlds. You are enthusiastically opening yourself to the evil that destroyed my people at the dawn of time. Understanding? No. All I have for you is pity."

traits.locale_text: « De quoi parlez-vous, mon-keigh ? Vous êtes aussi près de comprendre mon âme que vos pitoyables mondes de recevoir la lumière d'étoiles éteintes. Vous accueillez à bras ouverts le mal qui a détruit mon peuple à l'aube des temps. Nous comprendre ? Non. Tout ce que je ressens pour vous, c'est de la pitié. »

languages.text: "Ne zırvalıyorsun mon-keigh? Nurunu yitirmiş, soğuk yıldızların ışığı senin iğrenç dünyalarından ne kadar uzaksa sen de beni anlamaktan o kadar uzaksın. Ezelden beri soydaşlarımı kıran kötülüğe bile isteye kucak açıyorsun. Anlayış mı? Hayır. Sana yalnızca acıyorum."
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, mon-keigh? You are as far from understanding my soul as the light of the faded cold stars is far from your wretched worlds. You are enthusiastically opening yourself to the evil that destroyed my people at the dawn of time. Understanding? No. All I have for you is pity."
